title: YXX- Plus Size Female Sewing Mannequin Black/White, Adjustable Dress Form Manikin for Dressmakers, Students, Teenager & Tailors (Color : #1, Size : M)
features: 【Adjustable Height】: Adjustable height stand can reach 110cm(43.3 inch) to 180cm(71 inch),satisfying various demands.
【Foam Material】: The mannequin is made of foam body,linen cover and wheels base which is solid and durable enough to serve longer time and strongly support the whole dress form.
【Easy to assemble】: The mannequin is easy to install. It only ten minutes to install the base and support pole. Then you can start design your clothes or decorating your window.

【Great for Display】: You can use it to display your products in a window,on a counter,on a tiered display shelf,or on the floor. Ideal for sweaters,T-shirts,jackets,dresses,blouses,tops and accessories.
description: Our dress form mannequin is functional but graceful model to display your clothes. And mannequin cover feels soft and comfortable; For better displaying clothes to make it beautiful in look,a mannequin stand is quite needed! Clothing display mannequin is a good way for displaying clothes,making it seemingly like a real model.SpecificationMaterial: Foam Body + Linen Cover + Metal Base.Dimension:S - Neck(33cm/13") + Chest (80cm/31.5") + Waist (60cm/23.6") + Hips (86cm/33.8") + Shoulders (37cm/14.5”) ;M - Neck(33.5cm/13.2") + Chest (82cm/32.2") + Waist (62cm/24.4") + Hips (88cm/34.6") + Shoulders (37.5cm/14.7”);L - Neck(34cm/13.4") + Chest (84cm/33") + Waist (64cm/25.2") + Hips (90cm/35.4") + Shoulders (38cm/14.9”);XL - Neck(34.5cm/13.6") + Chest (86cm/33.8") + Waist (66cm/26") + Hips (92cm/36.2") + Shoulders (38.5cm/15.1" );XXL - Neck(35cm/13.8") + Chest (88cm/34.6") + Waist (68cm/26.8") + Hips (94cm/37") + Shoulders (39cm/15.3”);Package include:Mannequin x 1,(The matching product in the product image is not included in the package).Product benefits:Height adjustment lets you customize the dress form to your height in a snap.The mannequin's body is wrapped in fabric,comfortable and easy to clean.It is convenient for you to move the mannequin and suitable for you to place anywhere you need it.Display your clothes to view potential outfits,Ideal for sweaters,t-Shirts,jackets,dresses,blouses,tops and so on.Easy to assemble and disassemble.Warm tips:Keep the plastic bag provided to cover the dress form and help eliminate dust.Manual measurement,there will be 1-3cm error,please understand.If a slight odor is normal,it will disappear within two to three days.Due to light and personal differences in color understanding,there will be small color difference,in kind preva
